content:
Congratulations on your new job! It's great that you've found a silver lining in taking the bus to work. The extra time to listen to podcasts can be a wonderful way to unwind, learn, or get energized for the day ahead.

Three months in, how's the new job going? Are you enjoying the commute and the podcast-listening time, or are there other aspects of your daily routine that you're liking or finding challenging?

Also, have you noticed any differences in your listening habits or preferences since you started taking the bus? For example, do you find yourself gravitating towards certain types of podcasts or topics during your commute?
